partners.name: SSF
partners.blurb: Somali Data Protection Authority (DPA) joins the Network of African Data Protection Authorities (NADPA) to advance data protection through regional collaboration and shared standards.

partners.name: UNDP
partners.blurb: Somali DPA and Nigeria’s Data Protection Commission (NDPC) sign an MoU to foster bilateral collaboration and promote best‑practice data protection.

partners.name: IOM
partners.blurb: Somali DPA partners with Kenya’s Office of the Data Protection Commissioner (ODPC) to strengthen cross‑border cooperation on privacy and security.

partners.name: Kenya ODPC
partners.blurb: Somali DPA partners with Kenya’s Office of the Data Protection Commissioner (ODPC) to strengthen cross‑border cooperation on privacy and security.

partners.name: Kenya ODPC
partners.blurb: Somali DPA partners with Kenya’s Office of the Data Protection Commissioner (ODPC) to strengthen cross‑border cooperation on privacy and security.
